com.selesse.jxlint.report

Class XmlReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.selesse.jxlint.report.Reporter
      • com.selesse.jxlint.report.XmlReporter

  • public class XmlReporter
extends Reporter
    The XmlReporter provides a basic XML report. The schema is: 
    <issues>
     <issue name severity message category summary explanation location />
 </issues>
